title: 3D models for hydrothermal copper ore bodies at Sin Quyen deposit, North Vietnam: A case report for ore reserves and prediction of hidden mineral resource potential
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Dac Ngo Xuan, Trinh Phan Trong, Son Trinh Hai, Hau Bui Vinh, Dinh Nguyen Quoc, Duong Van-Hao
